title: *POND BUILD* for Florida Alligator Farm (Rec Pond Revealed)

tasks.task: Attending a pond building event at the Alligator Farm in St. Augustine, Florida
subtasks: Greeting attendees and introducing the project
Overseeing the construction of an 8x11 pond with a bird enclosure
Demonstrating ecosystem pond installation techniques
Educating participants on filtration systems and water feature creation
Coordinating with CACs (Certified Aquascape Contractors) during construction
Feeding crocodiles as part of the event's activities
Collaborating with advanced build teams led by Ed the Pond Professor

tasks.task: Participating in the construction and beautification of a custom water feature
subtasks: Laying out the pond and installing pipes
Excavating and setting the EPDM liner
Attaching skimmers and underlayment
Installing various components such as driftwood, rocks, and waterfalls
Incorporating biofalls and bird-friendly features
Grading and finishing the surrounding area

tasks.task: Learning from experienced contractors and industry professionals
subtasks: Networking with fellow participants and industry experts
Observing and assisting with advanced pond construction techniques

tasks.task: Managing public safety and wildlife interaction during event activities
subtasks: Ensuring crowd engagement and maintaining a positive atmosphere
Feeding and handling crocodiles safely for public viewing
Guiding attendees through the pond build process and providing hands-on experience

tasks.task: Attending the Aquascape Build-A-Pond Day event at the Alligator Farm

Additionally, the actual construction of the pond would be a task, but since it's a build event, maybe that's covered in the overall event attendance. So the MAINTASK is the event attendance, and the subtasks are all the roles and activities involved in making the event successful.
Managing public safety and wildlife interaction during the event. Subtasks would be leading the crocodile feeding and ensuring crowd safety.
And teaching the attendees would be another MAINTASK.
Attending a pond building event at the Alligator Farm for the Winter Retreat, with the main focus on building an 8x11 ecosystem pond and hosting an educational experience for newbies.
Building the 8x11 ecosystem pond and bird enclosure
subtasks: Excavating the pond area
Installing the EPDM liner
Constructing waterfalls and biofalls
Attaching skimmers and underlayment
Planting and grading surrounding areas
